name: Magnet Mage
description:
Welcome to Magnet Mage!

In this 2D Platformer, use magnets to glide through dangerous levels by taking advantage of the laws of magnetism!

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022!

Commands:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Activate Negative Force

Right Mouse Button - Activate Positive Force

GAME DESIGN

Ígor Ferreira

Luca Salgado

Maurício Wolff

PROGRAMMING

Maria Esteves

Vitor Salek

ART

SOUND DESIGN
